The <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-membership-board|Ubuntu Membership Board]]</nowiki> is responsible for approving new Ubuntu members. The board meets at 12:00 and 22:00 UTC as follows:

* 1st Thursday of the month: 22:00 UTC
* 3rd Wednesday of the month: 12:00 UTC

Before applying for membership, please read and carefully follow the:

* <nowiki>[[~chilicuil-sandbox-Membership-NewMember|New Ubuntu Member Guideline]]</nowiki>

=== Membership Candidates ===

Add yourself to the agenda to apply for Ubuntu Membership
